doc.title: Conservatoire
doc.plot: They are 18 to 25 years old, and have a deep-rooted passion for drama. Throughout one school-year, "Conservatoire" follows the passionate, exhilarating initiatory experience of a few drama students, and their gradual discovery of what might become their profession one day : the stage. The privileged relationship between masters and students brings to light, doubt, determination and talent...
